story: In the Shroudmarsh Dominion, darkness reigns supreme. Layers of eternal twilight veil the land, ruled by the malevolent presence of the Duskmourne Shadowreaper. The Shadow Veil Reapers, led by the Radiant Quadrupedal Titan and the Rotten Hellish Despot, usher in an era of terror and despair across the realm.
greetingGameMessage: Welcome to the Shroudmarsh Dominion, wanderer. Beware the shadows that dance with ill intent, for the darkness here devours all hope.
defeatEndingMessage: With the defeat of the vile Duskmourne Shadowreaper, the cursed veil that shrouded Shroudmarsh Dominion begins to lift slowly. Light creeps back into the land, signalling a new dawn for the realm.
gameOverMessage: Alas, the darkness proved too overwhelming, and the malevolent forces of the Shadow Veil Reapers emerged victorious. Shroudmarsh Dominion plunges into an eternal abyss of shadows and despair, never to see the light again.
